issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Update getBlocks method to take minBlockSize in RPC calls

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
{{TestGetBlocks.getBlocksWithException()}} has 3 parameters, but uses only one. So whatever callers think they pass in, it is ignored.
Looks like we should change it to use the parameters, but I am not sure how this will affect the test.
fields.summary: TestGetBlocks.getBlocksWithException() ignores datanode and size parameters.

comments.body:
[~shv] Thanks for filing this JIRA.
It has been a bit long time after this JIRA is created, so I take it over and upload v1 patch for this JIRA.
